  • Uses of Board in main

    Methods in main with parameters of type Board
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    CitizenList.addAllCitizensToMap(Board board)
    This method read all the citizenList and add, in random valid positions, the citizens to the map.
    Important: This method add all the citizens to the map.
    void
    CitizenList.addLastCitizen(Board board)
    This method add the last citizen of the citizenList to a random valid position of the board.
    void
    ResourcesList.addResourcesToMap(Board board)
    This method run over all the resourceList and add all the objects inside the list in randoms valid positions of one map.
    void
    BiomeGenerator.createCircularForest(Board board, int forests, int density)
    This algorithm fill the map with differents forests.
    static int
    InteractController.createFurniture(Board board, int totalOfWoodPlanks, Carpenter actualCarpenter, Lumberjack adjacentLumberjack)
    This method fill the map with random furniture.
    void
    BiomeGenerator.createNonCircularForest(Board board, int forests, int density)
    This algorithm fill the map with differents forests.
    void
    BiomeGenerator.createRandomTrees(Board board, int amount)
    This method generate 'x' trees and random coordinates to place them.
    void
    BiomeGenerator.createRiver(Board board, int rivers)
    This algorithm fill the map with differents rivers.
    static void
    InteractController.dismantleFurniture(Board board, int actualX, int actualY, Lumberjack actualLumberjack)
    This item took a Lumberjack and a adjacent Furniture object then dismantle the object and return wooden planks to the Lumberjack.
    static void
    InteractController.interactAll(Board board, CitizenList citizenList)
    This method runs over a CitizenList object and performs a interaction for each of the citizens inside using the interactSpecific() method.
    static void
    InteractController.interactBlacksmisth(Board board, Man genericBlacksmith)
    This metod scan the up, down, left and right coordinates of the Blacksmith and if find a Miner inside search for Mined gold in the miner inventory.
    static void
    InteractController.interactCarpenter(Board board, Man genericMan)
    This method cast the genericMan to a Carpenter.
    static void
    InteractController.interactLumberjackFurniture(Board board, Man genericMan)
    This metod scan the up, down, left and right coordinates of the Lumberjack and if find a base.Furniture object inside call the method dismantleFurniture().
    static void
    InteractController.interactLumberjackTree(Board board, Man genericMan)
    This metod scan the up, down, left and right coordinates of the Lumberjack and if find a base.Tree object inside call the Lumberjack.cutTree() method.
    static void
    InteractController.interactMiner(Board board, Man genericMiner)
    This metod scan the up, down, left and right coordinates of the Miner and if find a mineral inside call the Miner.crushingMineral() method.
    static void
    InteractController.interactSpecific(Board board, Man genericCitizen)
    This method took one 'genericCitizen' and search for his className.
    static void
    MoveController.moveAllCitizens(Board board, CitizenList citizens)
    This method read a CitizenList and, for each citizen in the list, generate one random direction (up, down, left, right) and move the citizen in that direction.
    static void
    MoveController.moveOneCitizenDown(Board board, Man citizen)
    This method move the citizen down X times where X is the citizenSpeed value.
    static void
    MoveController.moveOneCitizenLeft(Board board, Man citizen)
    This method move the citizen to the left X times where X is the citizenSpeed value.
    static void
    MoveController.moveOneCitizenRight(Board board, Man citizen)
    This method move the citizen to the right X times where X is the citizenSpeed value.
    static void
    MoveController.moveOneCitizenUp(Board board, Man citizen)
    This method move the citizen up X times where X is the citizenSpeed value.
    static void
    InteractController.template(Board board, Man genericMan)
    This method is a template.
